dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: A strange gentleman is going in your way

dialogue.name: Bernan
dialogue.text: Hey, you! Yes you.

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: Dwarf rubs his hands

dialogue.name: Bernan
dialogue.text: Splendid! In that case, lets move.

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: On one of the streets noise caught your attension

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: You see a group of people, which fight among one another without weapons. You can also see the owner of this self-proclaimed street arena, gathering money from all that want to participate

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: Your opponents were a bit drunk, fighting them was not a problem. You earned 15 gold.

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: Your opponents were a strong batch, but you overcame them, thought not from the first try. You earned 5 gold.

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: At first, everything was fine,but in the end you was too tired and lost a couple of fights. You lost 5 gold.

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: Luck was not at your side this time around, you lost all of your fights. You lost 10 gold.

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: You called the guard, and together you try to quell this arena and it's inhabitats

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: It was not easy at first

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: Some hits from brawlers were heavy

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: But in the end you and guards managed to end this arena and arrest it's leader

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: You also notice that some woman was watching you during this fight

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: She must be in a tavern now

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: Greetings, i want to thank you for what you have done there, on the streets.

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: Guards were probably already bribed by those thugs which organized these fights.

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: So, thanks to your shoutings they had no choice but to do something with it

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: She smiles a bit, while looking at you from up to bottom

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: My name is Iriana, i'm a priestess from the Cathedral of this city

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: We need some help and i think that you may be able to help us

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: The healer not far from this city, on north-west, haven't been in Tretogor for 4 days now

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: Without his herbs it will be impossible to heal people of this city

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: Thank you

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: I will wait for your arrival in cathedral

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: Of cource, i understand, there are other things that require your attention

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: I am here from time to time, maybe we will meet again when you will change your mind

dialogue.name: Iriana
dialogue.text: Tell the guards that you do the job for me and they will let you in

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: You see two orcs

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: They clearly want to fight you

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: After the fight you look around the hut to find the healer, or his remnants

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: You were looking in many places

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, you don't see any signs of him

dialogue.name: Narrator
dialogue.text: It is probably best to tell Iriana about this
